description:
Modern HCM solution empowers the individual by leveraging easy to use tools that are personalized, social, deliver insights and cover the full employee lifecycle. With Oracle HCM Cloud, you can find, grow, and retain the best talent, enable collaboration, provide complete workforce insights, increase operational efficiency and make it easy for everyone to connect on any device. The functionality captured in the Oracle Fusion Core HR is to support a reliable “system of record” providing a simple system to plan, hire, manage, and analyze a company’s workforce by consolidating headcount, positions, budgets, and costs; and providing flexible modeling support for global (or segmented) organizations in both standardized and shared employment structures. This course will give you a solid foundation for all key configurations related to Oracle Fusion Core HR module.

Course Outline

  • Fusion deployment options
  • Managing geographies in Fusion HCM
  • Understanding the standard configurations
  • Understanding Enterprise Structure in Fusion HCM
  • Workforce Structures setups
  • Salary Configuration
  • Roles and Security models in Fusion Cloud
  • Employee Hire process
title: Oracle Fusion Global HCM Overview
